website_summaries.verdict: The Parrot Minikit+ makes good use of its voice controls and excellent microphone to deliver clear calls and a safer driving experience.
pros: The Parrot Minikit+ offers hands-free calling and A2DP audio streaming
It automatically downloads the phone book off a paired phone, enabling voice dialing of any stored contact
The noise- and echo-reducing microphone ensures clear calls
cons: Speaker quality is passably good, but could stand a bit of improvement

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use the Parrot Minikit. It worked for the first 10 minutes. It paired with my iPhone and worked well for the first 10 minutes. Then, I parked my car and returned about one hour later. It did not work anymore after that. I connected it to the computer and it didn't even leave any light on (neither the red nor the green). I could not open the menu and update anything. I tried to reset as the website tells us to do so (pressing the whell + reset buttom) but it did not work as it didn't turn on. I don't know anything else to do. It is really not working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Glaucia B. Silveira

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT TIL IT BROKE
customer_reviews.text: I GOT THIS UNIT BECAUSE IT WAS RECOMMENDED TO ME. AFTER READING VARIOUS REVIEWS I CHOOSE THE ONE THAT WORKED FOR TWO PHONES (PERSONAL AND WORK). I WAS ABLE TO LOAD MY CONTACTS FROM BOTH EASILY BUT WAS UNABLE TO CALL OUT ON MY WORK PHONE WHICH WAS THE SECOND ONE I PAIRED. AFTER A MONTH I WAS ONLY ABLE TO ADJUST THE VOLUME, COULDN'T RECEIVE OR MAKE CALLS. I AM STILL GETTING ANOTHER ONE WITH THE CREDIT FROM AMAZON BUT WILL PROBABLY ON GET THE ONE FOR SINGLE PHONE.
customer_reviews.author: John Gill

customer_reviews.title: very fine!
customer_reviews.text: the parrot works great! the audio is not 100% clear but i can use it and handle it very fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lucho

customer_reviews.title: Good hearing
customer_reviews.text: It has good hearing quality and people whom I talk to while driving hear me well. It has long battery life. I usually charge the device once two weeks. It does not recognize names by voice well.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Winebrand

customer_reviews.title: Works great, east hook-up and pairing
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes I had it working, it automatically syncjed with my Nokia N97 phone and copied all phone book entries, duplex sound is great and quite suprizingly good for the low cost unit.
customer_reviews.author: Women's Rights News & LGBT News

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional.
customer_reviews.text: Very functional. A little quirky at times, for example, once in a while does not automatically go on when car door shuts. For the price it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J Janosko

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great When it works. Has a problem where it keeps forgetting it's phone book and needs to be resynced
customer_reviews.author: noah park

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Excellent voice recognition
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Excellent voice recognition! Having some difficulty with the call-end button. Twice now I have accidentally called someone and it would not let me hang up
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these. Didn't like them at all. Hard to understand and we didn't like the controls. We returned them. Very easy return process.
customer_reviews.author: cn43idaho

customer_reviews.title: Loses power quickly
customer_reviews.text: It must stay plugged in in order to continue to work. Gets overheated and doesn't work if left in a hot car. A few times I was unable to get it to respond at all. When it does respond, the voice is clear and understandable.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Rigiero

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Motorola series and other Name brands work better. The wake up and sleep feature is nice and keeps the battery going for a good while. Overall, I expected more from Parrot.
customer_reviews.author: Steve West

customer_reviews.title: Stop working properly after one day
customer_reviews.text: When I tried out the Parrot I thought it was great and I finally found a bluetooth device for my car that worked! The sound quality was excellent, voice commands worked great, and it was a slim profile. However, after one day I would get in my car and it would not connect to my phone. It would keep say it was downloading my contacts and I could not get it to stop. It was downloading nothing. The phone wasn't even connected and the contacts were already downloaded. Resetting the device was no help. Sent it back and looking for another bluetooth device for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent device, batteries are long lasting, very easy to program. Meets all my expectations. Recommend their use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact with good performance
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth Speakerphone has everything such a tool requires. The voice recognition however is mediocre and will lead to many unwanted phonecalls.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This hands free bluetooth speaker works pretty well in the car. It handled most tasks easily. Pros: + easy installation + recognized by the phone + loud enough to talk to other party Cons: - Cut out from time to time, dropped about 1 call in 20. Might have been phone, unable to test it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Marino

product_meta.title: Parrot Minikit with Bluetooth Speakerphone - Retail Packaging - Black
product_meta.description: Simultaneously Connects 2 Phones; Uses Voice Recognition To Call A Contact; Accepts Or Rejects Call By Voice; Automatic Switch On When User Gets Into Car; Stores Up To 20,000 Contacts In Kit Memory; Up To 6 Months Of Standby with Ultra-Low Power Mode; Kit Includes: 1 Usb/Mini Usb Cable, 12V Accessory Socket Charger, Elastic Strap & Quickstart Guide;
feature_bullets: Uses Voice Recognition To Call A Contact
Accepts Or Rejects Call By Voice

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars41 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
